channel.title: CVE Feed for The Heketi Project -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The Heketi Project -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-3899|2024-08-04T19:26:26.706Z -- the%20heketi%20project -- heketi
item.description: It was found that default configuration of Heketi does not require any authentication potentially exposing the management interface to misuse. This isue only affects heketi as shipped with Openshift Container Platform 3.11.
